name: Axis & Allies
summary: A WWII real-time-strategy game based on the popular board game and Timegate Studios previous game series, Kokan.

name: Axel & Pixel
summary: Axel and Pixel are trapped in a beautiful but dangerous dream world. If they plan to get out they must solve its mysteries. Drawn by hand and rendered in full high-definition, Axel & Pixel is a unique journey through an artist's dream. Axel and Pixel features 24 stunning chapters set in 4 different seasons, 3 vehicle minigames and many challenging puzzles.

name: Axis of Power
summary: Stylized characters fight focusing on gameplay mechanics MORE than common input dexterity requirements! A pick up and play arcade-style 3D fighter that will keep you on your toes at all levels!

name: Axe or Bone
summary: Axe or Bone is a fusion of Beat-'em-up and RPG elements. You will play as six different heroes, delving into six brutal campaigns, facing progressively deadly levels, until securing the final victory.

name: Axiom Verge 2
summary: You may have played Axiom Verge, or heard it referenced as a benchmark for indie “metroidvania” adventures. Axiom Verge 2 is part of the same story as Axiom Verge 1 but is a completely new game: new characters, new powers, new enemies, and a new world. You can play it before or after the original.

name: Axis Football 2023
summary: Axis Football is a simulation-style football game featuring the industry's best franchise mode, massive customization, and realistic gameplay.

name: Axis Descending
summary: Axis Descending is a Metroidvania Souls-like where you dodge, slash and shock your way through an expansive platforming world, encounter individually unique NPCs, traverse environments without a map and upgrade your character via horizontal progression.

name: Ax:El - Air XenoDawn
summary:
Build your own aircraft and prepare to fight. Combining the very best of sci-fi and aerial dogfighting gameplay, AX:EL delivers a totally new gaming experience. Create your very own shape-shifting vehicle and dominate both the sky and the ocean.

Build your own bespoke aircraft, from mainframe to wings. Dominate the skies then watch your aircraft morph in to a silent underwater killing machine as you chase the enemy from the blue skies in to the darkest depths of the ocean.

name: Axobubble
summary: In Axobubble you control a friendly axolotl in a world of platforms and creativity. Your main ability is to create floating bubbles that act as temporary platforms. Use these bubbles to jump higher, cross dangerous distances, and collect shells while advancing to the big star shell at the end of each level.

name: Axis Football 2018
summary: Axis Football is an American football simulation featuring a deep Franchise Mode and full customization.

name: Axe Me Why
summary: Survive 15-minute runs with 3D movement & uneven terrain in the Spirit Realm. Fight, forage & adapt while defending your village’s fading spirit. The stories of your people unfolding with your actions, new religions, good neighbors, spirit-tech punks & serial killers all rely on you to see tomorrow.

name: Axiom Alternative II
summary: Sacking an employee from The Violet Hotel soon becomes unwanted news on Grendel's malicious web blog. Can the protagonist stop Grendel from causing further problems ?

name: Axe, Bow & Staff
summary: A fantasy battle scroller where in one moment you gracefully support your companions with magic and arrows, and the next you accidentally throw them into goblin mayhem.

name: AxeSlinger
summary: AxeSlinger is a fast, heavy-metal roguelite FPS where you shred through demon-infested dimensions using guitar-weapons. Fight hordes, rack up insane combos, unlock powers, and battle colossal bosses as the last Death Angel of Shred on your path to reclaim your throne from the Battle Worm.

name: Axom: Conquest
summary: A base building roguelite tower defence game set on the dangerous planet named Axom. Gather resources to build defences, unlock research between games to get stronger and ultimately unlock the secrets of the mysterious planet.

name: Axyos
summary:
Axyos is an experimental FPS being made for players by players. Inspired by giants of gaming industry, we made a decision to create our own game, which would inherit some key aspects of FPS and MOBA genres but was built relying on opinions of common gamers. This is how AXYOS came to be. Together, we can make this game happen!

To say it simple - this game is a combination of a MOBA genre and mostly multiplayer FPS. We are trying to implement MOBA elements such as Ingame shop and session level-up system inside of a shooter mechanics. By the time of full release, we will introduce more and more of such elements and balance these two genres within one game.

name: Axelay
summary: An unknown alien race came to this planet and promptly laid waste to it. The remaining defense force has been sent out to try and defeat them. One lucky person gets to fly the latest line of defense ships made: the AX-77 Axelay. However, these ships are still in the prototype stage, and as such, only one exists.

name: Axe Party VR
summary: VR Axe Games

name: Axe Slasher
summary: Axe Slasher is a fast-paced 3D dungeon crawler where you slash through endless dungeons with your axe. Battle hordes of enemies and gather loot. Can you survive the depths and emerge victorious?

name: Axis Football 2015
summary: Axis Football is a 3D American Football Simulation Game that features a unique aimed passing system. Play in a single match, season mode, or local multiplayer! Offers basic mod support for team rosters.

name: Axeras
summary: As a young captain in the army, command Acorns Company in this turn-based tactical JRPG as you fight through the Evestrian Civil War. Use different units and combine abilities to secure battlefield superiority. The decisions you make on the battlefield will eventually catch up to you…

name: Ax Battler: A Legend of Golden Axe
summary: Use your wits and your razor sharp sword to recapture the Golden Axe from the diabolical Death Adder. Defeat skeletons and giant bats in dark, deep chasms and caves. And summon Earth, Thunder and Fire Magic to fight gargoyles that come to life before your eyes!

name: Axon Hero
summary: Help factories with their logistical problems. Creative puzzles!

name: Axis Shift
summary: Switch between Tank, Spaceship, and Submarine in this third-person sci-fi arcade shooter, battling waves of rabid mechanical beasts to uncover the truth behind Stroth XVI.

name: Axyz
summary: Axyz is a retro gravity switching puzzle game that asks the player to use their environmental and spatial awareness to beat each level within the time limit. Soak in the vaporwave, switch gravity, collect tapes, and more in this tribute to 90s puzzle games.

name: Axes
summary: Ready to take down all your enemies? Prepare your weapons and join Axes — an epic battle royale! It's an action-packed game where you prove that you can really rumble on the battlefield! Enter the arena and try to be the last one standing. Battle to survive using different weapons: axes, swords, shurikens and many more. Let the great scuffle begin!

name: Axima
summary: Welcome to the world of Axima, a Monster Taming RPG! Befriend and battle alongside over a hundred different Axi, while you explore the fully open world by yourself - or with your friends in multiplayer!

name: Axle
summary: Axle is a mobile platformer set in a world of gears. You play as an exuberant little gear named Axle who maneuvers through dangerous machines, repairing them from the inside out. The game features a vibrant hand-painted art style and an original electro-swing soundtrack in a unique and exciting world. Seamlessly fusing traditional platforming gameplay with innovative touch controls, Axle is an thrilling clockwork adventure for all ages.

name: Axyn Adventure
summary: Axyn Adventure is a retro style 3D platformer. You take control of the titular character Axyn and embark on many adventures with your friends Yunn and Leaf. Play in the vast open levels using your big set of moves to get around. Collect as many items as you can to advance the story and unlock tons of content.

name: Axolotl is Dry
summary: Axolotl is Dry is a precision platforming game where you play as a little axolotl taken from his home. You'll need to jump, dash and slide your way through the harsh desert before you sweat yourself dry. Help the axolotl get to his home!

name: AXA
summary:
AXA is an action-adventure featuring three big levels, six different graphical settings, 50 rooms to explore and more than 20 items to interact with. While the player uses the direction pad to have AXA walk, jump, climb and fight her way freely through the scenes in 2D arcade style, an icon-based menu can be popped up to perform the puzzle-related tasks such as examine, use or combine things.

The mobile game features original illustrations from Spanish artist Romero on whose comic strips and books the game is based. They introduce the player to the different chapters of the story and also reward him at the end of the game.

name: Axios Football
summary: Become the manager of a professional soccer team and lead it to the championship! Show patience and high skills to make your team legendary!

name: Axol's Quest
summary: Axol's Quest is a short, turn-based fantasy RPG about a young axolotl on an epic quest to save the Land of Xochimilco from a dastardly demon king! Brotherly bonds, team attacks, and plenty of barrel puzzles await you in this endearing adventure...

name: Axolotl Kingdom
summary: Axolotl Kingdom is a charming hand drawn pet simulator, where you can adopt your own Axolotl. You can customise your Axolotl with 40 unique accessories, with options for all styles! Our Kingdom is brimming with life, with locations such as the Cafe and Arcade. There’s so much to explore and enjoy!

name: Axe & Bow Land
summary: Axe & Bow Land is a retro platformer and puzzle game where brothers Axel and Bowie battle an ancient darkness in Aztec lands. With their magical weapons and unique abilities, they must overcome challenges in pixel art worlds and restore peace to their home.

name: Axxx: Taught and Fucked
summary: You want to help college girls improve their grades but your kinky mind and your curious cock, make what they are wishing for come true. Choose your actions wisely and teach them double lessons.

name: Axe Champ vs.
summary: Aim true, throw hard, and become the champion!

name: Axiom Alternative
summary: A short kinetic visual novel, independently written by Redewaan Duckett, giving an alternative take on the Welcome To... Chichester series

name: Axis Football 2024
summary: Axis Football is a simulation-style football game featuring the industry's best franchise mode, massive customization, and realistic gameplay.

name: Axe Prime
summary: Axe Prime is a medieval / fantasy fighting game There are 6 levels each level gets progressively harder

name: Axel in Harlem: The Game
summary: You're the chosen one to help him gather homies for... his "night parties". Guide him to victory before the time runs out!

name: Axyos: Battlecards
summary: Meet Axyos: Battlecards, the brand new tactical card game! Experience yourself in a role of the commander. Play multiplayer with your friends. Invent and utilize different tactics in a battle!

name: AX-5: Orion / Quest
summary:
Part of ASCII's AX series of baseline PC-6001 tape software, this compilation includes Orion, a first-person space-sim shooter a la Hadron or Star Raiders, and Quest, a maze-based dungeon crawler akin to Hunt the Wumpus.

Orion has you piloting a spacecraft and dogfighting with enemy vessels for points. The game eschews earlier Star Trek-based zone control systems for a more arcade-like experience, focused entirely on fast-paced combat. Different ships offer different challenges, both in tracking and aiming. Players at the time noted this game for its impressive graphics performance and replication of vector shooters on limited hardware.

Quest puts the player in a labyrinth which they must escape while defeating monsters. Using a radar to track these invisible enemies, you must collect ammunition throughout the corridors, shoot the beasts down, and reach the end unscathed. Like its companion program, this game relies on raster wireframe graphics to run smoothly.

name: Axial Null
summary: AXIAL NULL is a hybrid tactical roguelike, combining both Turn-based and Real-time elements into its core gameplay. Immerse yourself into The Void, erasing as many Anomalies as you can in a grid-based combat inspired by Megaman Battle Network series!

name: Axis Football 2020
summary:
Axis Football 2020 features massive gameplay improvements, football gaming's most complete Franchise Mode, and a slick new UI!

New in Axis Football 2020:
- Massively improved gameplay including catches on the run, smarter line blocking and AI, and much more!
- Redesigned draft experience featuring a live draft view
- New franchise startup options including random rosters and unlimited funds
- Added career stat tracking for all players across the league
- Added a local 2P Coach Mode
- New animations
- New stadiums

name: Axel Quest
summary: A 2D action-adventure game with Metroidvania elements. Explore, fight monsters, collect equipment, unlock new paths, and challenge bosses in a handcrafted pixel-art world inspired by retro classics.

name: Axis & Allies 1942 Online
summary: Axis & Allies Online is an official adaptation of the classic board game! Strategize your way to victory as the United Kingdom, Soviet Union, United States, Germany, and Japan vie for world domination at the height of the second World War.

name: Axie Infinity
summary: Axies are fierce creatures that love to battle, build, and hunt for treasure! Players can build up a collection of Axies and use them across an ever expanding universe of games! Axie Infinity uses cutting edge technology called Blockchain to reward players for their engagement.

name: Axegend
summary: Axegend VR is a Roguelike strategic action adventure game. You will play as a versatile knight who will gives his all to save the princess. Anything could become a weapon in his hands: umbrella, tires, boomerang, axe, tube, even...

name: Axe Cop
summary: Fight all of the bad guys! Axe Cop and his team of colorful characters must go on an epic adventure, that covers his ten-year comic book history, to rid the world of all bad guys once and for all!

name: Axis Football 2026
summary: Axis Football 2026 is a complete American Football Simulation featuring fluid gameplay, endless customization, and the industry's best franchise mode.

name: Axiom Verge
summary:
After a lab accident, a scientist awakens in a mysterious, alien world. Is this a distant planet? The far future? Or a complex virtual-reality computer simulation?

Plumb the recesses of a large, labyrinthine world in order to learn its secrets and uncover your role within it. Discover tons of weapons, items, and abilities, each with their own unique behaviors and usage. You’ll need your wits to find them all.
Combat bizarre biomechanoid constructs, the deadly fallout of an ancient war, and the demons of your own psyche.

And finally, break the game itself by using glitches to corrupt foes and solve puzzles in the environment. Life. Afterlife. Real. Virtual. Dream. Nightmare. It's a thin line.

It's Axiom Verge.

name: Axolotl
summary: 11 narrowly playable gimmickmap vignettes made over the course of two months

name: Axilon: Legend of Artifacts - Prologue
summary: Axilon: Legend of Artifacts - Prologue is a first-person fantasy action RPG game. Awaken your true power and resist the forces of evil that are trying to destroy your world.

name: Axel's Journey
summary: A low-poly puzzle platformer about mutant axolotls!

name: AxE: Alliance Vs Empire
summary:
Unite to fight! Join a guild, battle and experience the most immersive and large-scale MMORPG battles ever seen on a phone. 
 
Introducing AxE: Alliance vs Empire, a massive and innovative MMORPG set in a mysterious, fantasy open-world. Enter the epic conflict between two powerful factions as they fight to control the fate of the world. 
 
Play online fantasy games with your friends and millions of players worldwide, using single player, co-op and competitive modes inspired by the best MMOs and open-world games on PC and console. 
 
With a rich fantasy story, a comprehensive set of features, and a living open-world, AxE offers one of the most fully realized game worlds on mobile. Join players on the newly launched server!

name: Axia
summary:
In this high-speed action space shoot-em-up, you're Max Dellamorte, a bounty hunter, passing through the Auburn Planetary System. The local government has been losing trading convoys passing through the asteroid belt that surrounds the system, and has contracted with you to help hold off the unknown enemy until help from The Federation can arrive. 
 
You start the game in a single-shot fighter spacecraft, with the ability to upgrade your armament as you collect bounties on each enemy ship (as well as asteroids) you destroy. Every five waves you automatically return to the Auburn weapons shop where you can buy your upgrades.

name: AX: Portal Slayers
summary: AX: Portal Slayers is a free-to-play action PVP third-person FPS game. Set in the realm where reality and fantasy intersect, players defeat monsters to enhance their abilities. Utilize various tactical items to achieve victory in battles against other players.

name: Axecutioners
summary: A minimal-input fighting game to determine who is the greatest Axecutioner of them all! Your huge, unwieldy axe ensures that each of your attacks are slow yet powerful, meaning you need to think and strategize before your next attack to claim victory over your opponent!

name: Axan Ships
summary: Sci-fi, roguelike in space with RTS camera; an adventure with pirates where every ship component might break down

name: AxySnake
summary: AxySnake is a 3D action game based on the famous Snake game. By giving the classic Snake a new dimension, we have given it a new life. 3D graphic effects are strengthened by stereo sounds! Many wonderful music tracks are included in the game. Frightening monsters and a variety of bonuses all made in full 3D bring the old game to an entirely new level. The complete AxySnake distribution package includes 6 types of games. Overall, there are 80 different levels in the game!

name: Axis Football 2019
summary: Axis Football is an American football simulation featuring immersive gameplay, a deep franchise mode, and extensive customization.

name: Axes and Arrows
summary: Axes and Arrows is an intense action-combat platformer inspired by nostalgic and modern couch multiplayer games.

name: Axet
summary: In this game, you control a ball. This ball moves continually up and down. You only can influence the horizontal direction. The levels are concipated with different blocks. There are different kinds of blocks and different colors. You have to destroy all "empty" blocks. You can do this by touching them with the ball. But there is a small problem: The ball must have the same color as the block you want to destroy.

name: Axiom
summary: semi-dark underground map

name: Axiom Verge 1 & 2 Double Pack
summary:
Axiom Verge 1:

This is the action-adventure you've been waiting decades for. After a lab accident, a scientist awakens in a mysterious, alien world. Is this a distant planet? The far future? Or a complex virtual-reality computer simulation?

Plumb the recesses of a large, labyrinthine world in order to learn its secrets and uncover your role within it.

Discover tons of weapons, items, and abilities, each with their own unique behaviors and usage. You'll need your wits to find them all.

Combat bizarre biomechanoid constructs, the deadly fallout of an ancient war, and the demons of your own psyche.

And finally, break the game itself by using glitches to corrupt foes and solve puzzles in the environment.

Axiom Verge 2:

You may have played Axiom Verge, or heard it referenced as a benchmark for indie action-exploration games. This long awaited sequel expands on the universe with completely new characters, abilities, and gameplay.

Indra, the billionaire behind the worldwide Globe 3 conglomerate, heads to Antarctica to investigate the disappearance of her daughter, but ultimately finds herself in entirely different reality, infected by parasitic machines that both aid and confound her. Where is she? Who is the mysterious person goading her from the other end of the computer terminal?

Explore an alternate Earth-like world, replete with the ruins of an ancient, high-tech civilization. Hack machines. Battle monsters. Use your remote drone to enter the Breach, a parallel but connected reality that is filled with its own dangers. You’ll want to search every inch for the hidden items and upgrades you need to survive.

This bundle has been rated E10 to T.

name: AX-6: Powered Knight
summary: Action game developed by ASCII.

name: Axo Away
summary: shared text messages between long distance friends

name: Axial Drift
summary: Axial Drift is an online-multiplayer FPS-Z modding platform where you can create your own maps, skins, weapons, and game modes using Unreal Engine 4.

name: Axon TD: Uprising
summary: From the developers of Element TD 2 comes a Mazing Tower Defense where you can expand the map layout itself. A huge arsenal of towers and a wide variety of enemies clash in a battlefield that shifts on your whims. Engage in single, cooperative, or roguelite gameplay.

name: Axe Champ
summary:
Axe Champ is a axe throwing game !

Throw axes through the targets in Axe game !

Crush those targets and go all out for the best score!

name: Axis
summary:
Axis is a multiplayer first-person shooter with mechs. However, these are not the big and clunky robots usually featured in mech games, but fast machines which have the ability to float for a short amount of time. This means the game speed is more akin to mid-nineties shooters like Quake. The backdrop story is set in the 22th century when multinational companies fight over resources. 
 
The game features overall eight multiplayer modes (e.g. Deathmatch, Rocket Arena or Gladiator) with differences regarding rules and winning conditions, but generally they all involve the player fighting alone against the opposition by running (and floating) around, shooting weapons at other players and picking up power-ups (e.g. armor, shields or damage multiplier) which spawn on the 28 maps. The basic stats of the player's mech, e.g. armor or the boost speed, are determined by the chosen pilot character and the used mech components which can be changed for arms, legs, chassis, head, booster and weapon load-out. All those components have strengths, weaknesses and weight, the latter being the restricting factor. 
 
The game also has a single-player mode, skirmish, which consists of playing multiplayer matches against bots. Playing through the scenarios rewards additional mech components for use in multiplayer.

name: Axeson's Fury VR
summary: Axeson's Fury VR throws you into an intensely combative arcade style virtual reality environment that will have you fighting for your life and that of your family as society is turned by dark unknown forces. Become John Axeson and be all you can be... one mean slick fighting machine!

name: Axona
summary: Axona is a grid-based puzzle game which requires 3-dimensional thinking and careful planning. Pick up the keys with the correct face of your cube and unlock the glyphs to open the gate in each level.

name: Axe Throw VR
summary:
You've got a HTC Vive and some cool motion controllers, but what can you really do with them? Throw some virtual axes! 
 
In Axe Throw VR, a virtual axe throwing range becomes your playground!

name: Axel City
summary: An indie 2D fighting game by Project Atsuki, made with ASCII's 2D Fighter Maker software. Along with an updated 2009 "Gaiden" revision, it later received a full-fledged sequel for arcades.

name: Axiallis
summary: Tetris like sci-fi block puzzle game

name: Axolotl
summary: Become a magnificent elephant who climbs things in the mid of a desert.

name: Axe: Survival
summary: It's hard. Surviving in the gigantic open world will be a little harder every day. Survive the boundaries!

name: AXS
summary: AXS allows players to experience the fun and adrenaline-packed snowboarding across mountain ranges all over the world. There are 20 Levels waiting players to unlock and 9 characters to choose from. AXS packs reality-defying game-play into every run letting players Stunt, Trick and snowboard down huge open mountains within the time limit. Where players attempts to conquer the deadly descents across the world, including the Himalayas. Throughout the game, players navigate various snowy levels and perform tricks. Players receive points for successfully performing tricks and stunts. Players have to snowboard to the finish-line ( blimp and tower indicator) within the time limits. Upon completing the level, it unlocks the next level. Altogether 20 levels to unlock. If you fail to complete, never mind just re-attempt the level again. To rank up and successful in this game, you need to collect stars and points. Points are awarded for tricks, stunts performed by the players. Honorary Titles will also be bestowed for outstanding stunts performed. You can also record videos of the stunts and trick to share and brag to friends!

name: Axe Champ!
summary: Axe Champ is a axe throwing game! Throw axes and smash the targets! Go all out for the best score! Cool graphics, extremely addictive game-play, amazingly fun ! Play Axe Champ now!

name: AX-3: Microthello
summary: Othello game developed by ASCII.

name: Axis & Allies
summary: Axis & Allies is an adaptation of the Risk-like board game centred around World War II.

name: AX-9: Flight Simulator
summary: Flight sim developed by ASCII.

name: Axl Fangame
summary: This is a Megaman X fangame. It involves Axl shooting at Metalls.

name: Axis Football League
summary: A top-down football game

name: Axolotl Museum
summary: Axolotl Museum is a short game about the axolotl. Learn about the axolotl's habitat, food, predators, and more!

name: AX-2: Uchuu Yusousen Nostromo
summary: The first survival horror game.

name: Axial Disc 2
summary: The long awaited sequel to Axial Disc 1!

name: Axiom Soccer
summary:
"Axiom Soccer represents a new generation of high-adrenaline digital sports, combining the best of real world ball games and third person shooters. 
 
Start scoring goals within minutes, and hone your shooting skills and team tactics to eventually play tournament matches in front of a live, virtual, in-game crowd."

name: Axes and Acres
summary: Axes and Acres is a deep and engaging single-player strategy game designed to create exciting decisions every turn. The rules are easy to learn, but every turn can be played out in many different ways in order to farm, build and survive.

name: Axe Me Down
summary: An Indie Platform Battler where your main objective is to push your friends off the screen with throwing Axes. Available for two to six players.

name: Axe Champ Shoot Out
summary: Can you be the Axe Champ?

name: Axolotl Stars
summary:
The axolotls came out of the water to play. Be an axolotl and join the endless fun.
Race other axolotls and avoid an abundance of hazardous obstacles to become the axolotl star. Run through the chaotic levels and reach the finish line first.

name: Axan Ships: Low Poly
summary: Sci-fi, roguelike in space; an adventure in a world where every component of your ship might break down

name: Axe Over It
summary:
A game where you control an axe with the objective of climbing as high as you can.  
inspired in "Getting Over It", a frustrating experience.

name: Axolochi
summary: Axolochi is an axolotl simulator. Bathe it, feed it, teach it to pirate random underwater treasure, and give it all the love and attention it needs to grow to an adult before you send it off into the world to fulfill its mystical destiny. But don't worry your pretty, air-breathing head off. For every axolotl adult you release to the mystical unknown, you'll get a brand new axolotl egg that you can hatch and play with.

name: Axe Climber
summary: How high can you climb with your ice axe?

name: Axis Football 2017
summary: Axis Football is an American football simulation featuring massive customization and a complete franchise mode

name: Axe Girl
summary: Axe Girl! The only video game starring a female lumberjack. (As far as we know) Slash your way through fierce foes in this awesome action platformer! Chop to it and kick some axe!

name: Axiom
summary: In a cyberpunk world where giant corporations take advantage of their power, only those with the ability to enter the human mind can stop corruption at its source. You are a mind assassin called Miles and this mind-bending first-person action-adventure is your story of revenge.

name: Axizon Labs: Zombies
summary: Axizon Labs: Zombies is a 2D Sci-Fi themed Platform Zombie Shooter Game based on the story of the sudden outbreak of ZMB Virus which affected 30% of the population around the world.

name: Axis and Allies
summary: The classic board game from Hasbro was licensed by Philips Media and converted to CD-i by Capitol Multimedia inc, better known as CapDisc. This game was a USA exclusive release although various European CD-i distributors did import the game, especially true of UK based retailers.

name: Axiom of Maria
summary: Axiom of Maria is a fast-paced, unconventional action-adventure game with an intriguing story set in Seoul, 2074.

name: Axium's Box
summary: Climb, FALL, Die! is the theme of Axium's Box, a game that draws inspiration from "Getting Over It" and "Jumper King," while taking it to a whole new level with stunning 3D graphics. If you enjoy pain, frustration, challenging obstacles, and, paradigm shifts then Axium's Box is the game for you.

name: Axe.io
summary: Thrown into a small battle arena with a squad of other deadly knights, you’ll have to slay them with throwing axes and survive as long as possible if you want to get out alive! With action packed, fast-paced gameplay and brutal combat, AXE.IO will have you on the edge of your seat!

name: Axial Disc 1
summary: A modern turn-based deckbuilding JRPG involving party synergy for attacks that features unique pixel art and chiptune music!

name: Axiel
summary: Axiel is a casual puzzle game. No timers, no scoreboards, no rush. Take your time.

name: Axu
summary: An open-world graphical roguelike. Still in development.

name: Axe Gang
summary: Axe Gang is a co-op VR/noneVR game for PC that features an epic battle of four Survivors with axes against the Infected robots.

name: A/X-101
summary:
In the future date of 2500, mankind has reached its zenith in space travel and peace. However, after making contact with alien life for the first time, Earth is soon attacked and nearly conquered by a war-driven alien race called the Gurzons. The Earth's Defense Force discover the Gurzon's enemy resides on the distant alien planet Prism, who made contact with Earth as a warning against the oncoming Gurzon invasion. Further investigation leads to the discovery of a computer upgrade system located on Prism called the A/X-101, a weapon program that promises to liberate Earth from the Gurzon's grip. Earth Defense sends four of its best fighter pilots - Bob, Kelly, Chris and their Captain (the player) - to travel to Prism, retrieve the A/X-101 and use it against all of the Gurzon's planetary bases.

The game is an on-rails shooter, with gameplay seen from a first-person cockpit perspective. The player's ship moves automatically through pre-rendered space and planetary environments and only the targeting crosshair can be moved freely. Laser Cannons and Fusion Warheads are available to hit the numerous enemies. Lasers have unlimited ammunition but need a few moments time to recharge. The warheads function as smart bombs and clear the screen of enemies, but are available only in limited supply. They are restocked when reaching a certain score. The ship's energy shield functions as a life bar.

Between the shooting levels, there are transitional cutscenes, pre-rendered in the same way as the actual gameplay.

name: Axl & Tuna
summary:
Axl & Tuna is a humorous take on the endless runner, featuring beautiful animations, family-friendly humor, and hours of entertainment.
Go beyond the tap-tap! Discover unparalleled jumps, catching air, fast free falls and forward/backward flips all at your fingertips!
Help Axl chase lost Fuzzbot in the Fuzzbot Factory. Beat your daily best scores for the number of Fuzzbots collected, distance covered, and tricks performed.
New day? You play on a completely new track!

name: Axembler
summary: Axembler is a collection of single-level games developed in a single application.

name: Axion
summary: Axion is an open world first/third person shooter with rpg and survival elements. The game is single player or multiplayer with LAN and online capability. Features include a large open world, character development and storyline in both single and multiplayer.

name: Axis Football 2016
summary: Axis Football is a an American football simulation featuring innovative aimed passing and massive customization.

name: Axanael
summary:
Shoot - and your wish will come true. But one of the bullets is real. Pull the trigger if you're ready to risk your life." 
 
Deep below Akihabara, a version of Russian roulette called the Kagome Game is being played on New Year’s Eve 2010. Six people take turns shooting a gun called Axanael, which has the ability to grant wishes. However, there is a price for equaling the hopes, and it is paid by one of the players' lives.

name: Axiom Verge: Multiverse Edition
summary:
Includes: 
- Copy of the game disc/cartridge. 
- Deluxe booklet with developer’s commentary and art. 
- Double-sided poster with the world map and weapons/items in the game. 
- Exclusive making-of documentary. 
 
The Nintendo Switch version also includes the games soundtrack but costs an extra 10$ on the system.

name: Axis Football 2021
summary: Axis Football is a simulation-style football game featuring the industry's best franchise mode, massive customization, and realistic gameplay.

name: Axis Assassin
summary: Tempest clone

name: Axilon: Legend of artifacts
summary: This game is in the RPG fantasy genre, the action of which takes place in the world of warriors and magicians. The main character is Alvutar, the son of a great warrior who fought for peace. He has to go the way of the warrior mage, meet or fight with different types of creatures, as well as save the world from causing darkness.

name: Axe Ghost
summary: In Axe Ghost you play cards to battle an advancing monster horde in turn-based spatial combat. Manipulate enemy positions, group monsters for high scores, and face off against the loathsome Garnemar!
